dcterms:description: A dataset containing 6,287 CLE images (3,126 diagnostic and 3,161 nondiagnostic) from 20 patients with glioma brain tumors, used for training a weakly-supervised learning model for feature localization.
dcterms:title: Classification Dataset

dcterms:creator: N. Murthy

dcterms:description: A segmentation dataset including 310 CLE images annotated by four neurosurgeons, highlighting diagnostic glioma features at different scales.
dcterms:title: Segmentation Dataset
